divs: Sighting Details1.i was in the bath room 2.well i looked out of my bath room window 3.i thought it was a serch plain looking for somebodyin the nabor hood. 4. well the object was triangle shap like the stealth but in a half moon shap. 5. i was shocked for a while becasue this was the first time i seen one. 6.well after thirth seconds went by it flown away
